text: Devit garima, Ikiavɨra Itir God uan anɨngagharim Usa gingezɨ an areme. Ezɨ Devit bar God baseme. Egha me danganir kam dɨbora ghaze, God uan anɨngagharim Usa ginge, egha datɨrɨghɨn me uaghan kamaghɨra a dɨboravɨra iti.6:8 Akar kam “datɨrɨghɨn,” an en dughiar kam mɨgeir puvatɨ. A dughiar gumazim akɨnafarir kam osirizim mɨgei.
